theme: Educational, friendly, approachable, modern - designed for students to feel comfortable practicing conversations
target_audience: Students (high school and college age) looking to practice communication skills

icon_system.color_usage: Inherit from parent or use theme colors

when_to_generate: User avatar placeholders for different personas/characters
when_to_skip: Chat interface elements - use icons instead
Navigation and UI controls - icons are more appropriate
Form elements - focus on clean UI patterns
style_preferences: Modern, clean aesthetic matching the blue/green/orange palette
Professional quality appropriate for educational context

design_rationale.color_choices: Blue (#3b82f6) provides trust and professionalism essential for educational tools. Green (#10b981) creates a positive, encouraging learning environment. Orange (#f97316) adds warmth and energy to maintain student engagement without being distracting.
design_rationale.typography_choice: Inter chosen for exceptional readability in chat interfaces and screens. Its clean, modern appearance works well for sustained reading of conversations while maintaining professional educational credibility.
design_rationale.icon_strategy: Lucide provides comprehensive icons perfect for chat interfaces (message bubbles, send buttons, user indicators) with consistent stroke-based styling that feels modern and approachable for students.
design_rationale.imagery_approach: Web-app focused on chat functionality - minimal image generation, focusing on user avatars and onboarding illustrations. Icons handle most UI needs to maintain clean, distraction-free learning environment.
design_rationale.effects_rationale: Subtle glassmorphism and shadows provide visual hierarchy in chat interfaces without overwhelming the educational content. Quick transitions (200ms) maintain responsiveness expected by students while gentle hover effects provide clear interaction feedback.
